abstracts.abstract: Nominates Mitchell R. Davis III as a Member of the Commission on Discrimination and Hate Crimes.

actions.description: Received by the Senate Sen. Laura M. Murphy
Placed on Calendar Order of Executive Appointments May 20, 2025
